#Getting Started


Instructions:

* Download Eclipse MDT versions 3.5 (Galileo) or 3.7 (Indigo)
* Install JET, Operational QVT and OCL
* Install UML2 Tools (The update site for Eclipse 3.7 is available in the Downlads page).
* Copy the BPMN+X plugins (Available on the Downloads page) into the plugins directory of Eclipse.
* Open the workspace provided on the Downloads page.
